DOC.brief_summary: The purpose trial evaluate safety indicator efficacy 4 dos orally administer dabigatran etexilate , administer twice daily , compare placebo give addition dual antiplatelet treatment patient index event ( MI ) high risk new ischaemic cardiovascular event .
DOC.brief_title: RE-DEEM Dose Finding Study Dabigatran Etexilate Patients With Acute Coronary Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion Patients acute coronary syndrome least one additional risk factor cardiovascular complication . Exclusion criteria 1 . Long term treatment oral anticoagulant 2 . Severe/disabling stroke within last 6 month 3 . Conditions associate increased bleeding risk 4 . Anaemia thrombocytopenia 5 . Severe renal impairment 6 . Liver disease 7 . Positive pregnancy test
